component.text: By successfully completing this course, you have gained the knowledge and skills necessary to prepare you for a career as an entry-level network support technician in an enterprise network. The two following activities that culminate this course are designed to give you an opportunity to demonstrate your new abilities. Businesses increasingly rely on their enterprise network infrastructure to provide mission critical services. Outages in the enterprise network prevent the business from performing its normal activities, which can cause lost revenue and lost customers.To prevent disruption design the network to maximize bandwidth utilization and improve overall network performance.
